title: Promoting Applied Research, Development and Innovation - Croatian Perspectives

author: Pero Munivrana, HIT Croatian Institute of Technology

segmentation: OK, so it's a pleasure for me now to introduce a director of creation, New Creation Institute of Technology.
It's an effort of the current government to put an accent on technology in quite a good way.
So Doctor Moon if Anna please give us.
Thank you very much.
No, I will try to explain how we in Croatia how we think that we can help.
That knowledge may improve the economy in fact and we are established.
By Ministry of Science, Education and Sport.
And we are organized as a company.
This may be very interesting idea 'cause this is not very usual, even though we act as agency, we are registered in as a company and we're trying to work as a company and.
We are our money is governmental money, budgetary money.
But we are trying to invest it as as not bankers, but some some VCs maybe.
And our idea is to put money into projects and to to cover the risk of projects and then further on also those those investment in fact or open doors for us into.
Scientific institutions and research institutions, and we're trying to find something that worked for business.
Activities of creation.
Institute of Technology is.

In fact, our main purpose and the idea for establishing gas is to take a test program that's national funding program for high tech projects, and then after that that's the Department for Transfer Technology International.
Aeration, business intelligence and technology foresight.
Those are all.
The function so for Creation Institute of Technology.
This is also gonna grammar fast and which covers all those functions.
Well, those test program that's our main activity.
As I said before and through that program we're trying to to develop new technologies that from the preparation phase two original solution.
So our customers are in academic community and scientific and research community with good ideas.
This is completely bottom up program.
And cover all kinds of everything.
I will show you later for through through our projects that we are covering all areas for development and research.
Well, we are in a way oriented so are the toward applied Sciences.
But we also we are not hesitate to finance basic Sciences if we saw something that that might become.
Subject of commercialization or four to protect the intellectual property.
So we see the science as a three and our role is to to find some apples on the tree and to sell it in fact.
Well, I will just pass through our ongoing projects which are not there is at the moment something 15 projects at the moment.
We are still young.
Organization are our first project.
That's this one platform for free, creative, short lived digital content for telecommunications services.
That's something that you can from through SMS system in your mobile.
Ask any kind of information where are you?
Where is the?
Cash machine nearest or something.
You may buy tickets for a movie or something like that.
Ask what's going on in the movie and then buy ticket you have barcode on your mobile.
You can enter into cinema or other things you can provide with that project and this project will last for two years and it will finish at the end of this year.
So that's our first project and then we will go into phase of commercialization and then we will see how we good in that or not.
So we do different things.
Those projects are from on various faculties and and through the whole creation.
We do some serums, we do robots.
We do.
Intelligent Control systems development.
So those are our projects and This is Money that we provide for those projects.
It looks better in coolness and then we speak about millions but OK.
This creation those our last project that we contacted is prototype of a robotic system for assisting in surgery so and that's quite sophisticated.
Project.

So so concerning technology transfer, we're trying to first of all with the other organization who are in charge for us for this topic in Croatia to to educate academic community about importance of intellectual properties and what they can do with that in Croatia Till before I don't know.
Couple years, scientific community wasn't very aware of importance of intellectual properties so.
They rather go and publish something, some discoveries and there is no much chance to to make a business out of it.
So now we're trying to stop that way and we will try to do some startups, new companies and push them more toward the business.
Our International Combination unit is connected with.
In fact, it is established for framework program and that's a network of national contact points.
In fact, they are all positioned into Creation Institute of Technology.
So there there are always as national contact point release, so their connection between Europe and Europe research space and the creation.
Of course I'm to inform our scientists how to.
To join and how to apply for FB 7 and to find the.
To find some other institution that make concerts and so.
OK, our business intelligence unit is.
Is unit that help us into evaluation of projects that are through for the test from the beginning?
They also trying to find out what's going on in the world in the specific area.
How's the situation with the interactor property?
So they have to find into all patents basis basis in the fall Ward and to find to find.
Whether we going into the right direction at those high tech that we think high tech is already existed, so and and those kind of things.

Also we trying to explain the method methodology of work of business intelligence that all scientists, when they thinking about some projects, how they can also do some research and where to take a look other day.
To date or or that, the ideas by belong to pass the holiday foresight.
Is a tool for defining national technology priority and we we are now in the face to.
Try to persuade our ministry and government to provide us money to to organize national national.
Visual.
Exit.
National exercise for technology foresight and we hope we've well.
Fortunately, unfortunately, it's a world crisis, so we don't have at the moment enough money to to provide that exercise.
But we hope that they think will go better and that we will do that.
And idea is that we are just coordinating body for, for that exercise will try to to motivate people to.
Go into that and I hope maybe a lot of you here will be included in that exercise.
That's it, thank you for your.
Thank you very much.
Are there some questions from the audience or comments?
Please.
Yes please.
We do have a microphone Now, yes.
So please just wait for a second.
Weather I want to see the question because the mother because you have this.

Some high tech projects in return to the state if you're working on these are condemning institutions information, So what about people who are not part of academic institutions and might have very original idea?
Is there any possibility taking yes?
Well, we suggest there is two ways there is our sister organization Bikri.
So here members of bigger so that they can apply in to be growing tourism and the other possibility to come on hit is to find somebody from home, some faculty or instead so they can they can.
They are our customers institutions and they can put you into project.
And and like that, you might be leader of the project.
That's not problem, but they have to come to us.
Could I add a question to 2nd the previous question?
As you know, I did have experience in history program before the Institute of Technology was established with the Technology Council.
At that moment I had exactly the same situation.

I had an inventor who came with some proposal to our Institute and jointly we applied and were successful in being granted with the program, but we have had the intellectual property rights difficulties at some collaboration programs which were leading us to the end of corporations.

I would like to ask you, knowing this situation before HT was founded and now when it exists as an institution, how would you define the improvement for such circumstances nowadays in comparison to the previous time?
Is it more efficient?
What do you do better then was done by the technology console?
Well, first of all, at the beginning when we take that program, we saw the end of the experience from previous test program which was.
Made through the Ministry of Science, Technology and at that time our Minister anyway and they gave money that we have for that test program.
They spread on, let's say 100 projects, so the money was less into one project.
We decide to finance with the same amount of money, about 10 projects.
So ten time more money into one project.
That's first and the 2nd is.
That we are.

We have experts for intellectual property and we are ready to finance intellectual property protection so and we have this advice as advisory body and also to finance you to protect your internal problems.
Let's say and yeah efficient because we are faster.
We are up to date and we are professional to do that.
And in ministry that work at whole body in fact.
Thank you.
Belief.
There are no other questions of comments.
I would like to ask Doctor Honeywell once again for a very informative talk.
I'm sure there will be some questions during these two days in close discussions because to take care about intellectual property, yes.
